audio_caption: The clip begins with a screeching sound, immediately followed by a scream. A male speaker then introduces that they are in St. Clairsville, and states their intentions to visit a Party City across the street from the mall to check out the Halloween decorations, briefly referencing an Eddie Murphy song. The speaker expresses surprise at the lack of Halloween displays outside and proceeds inside. The clip then transitions to background music that is suspenseful and eerie.

The clip begins with an excited male speaker who states, "Ooh, first in the door," commenting on seeing a "giant pumpkin balloon" and a "ghosty on top," continuing with enthusiasm about spiders, chains, a "cool skeleton gate," and a "witch balloon," noting "little spiders on her broom." The speaker then refers to "Twisted Jack," "Lady of the Grave," and a "two-headed doll" that appears porcelain and doesn't do anything. The speaker highlights "black ravens" and a "dropping spider," finding it scary and motion-activated.

The clip starts with a male voice, excitedly saying, "Holy crap, look at this," describing something as "Temple of Doom," then noticing "joints."  He jokingly points out the object being like "a cockroach or something." The male voice continues, remarking on "black roses," noting they're almost black. He then addresses those "almost dead." The speaker continues to describe the Halloween decorations including a "life size skeleton," "some hanging bones," and a "bag of skulls." He then comments that "they have a Tiger King outfit" which he notes as "hilarious," then mentions jewelry and eyebrow rings, before pointing out "hanging spookiness," then mentioning the arrangement of the props. Next, the speaker points out "giant inflatable monkey," before noting "Zero" from Nightmare Before Christmas, and then "Jack Skellington pumpkin," which lights up, describing it as "cool."

The audio clip begins with the sound of low-energy instrumental background music that sets a somewhat eerie mood, transitions into the speech of one male speaker discussing "ghosts" and "mummy ghosts". He then mentions "good looking masks" and proceeds to list several masks, including "Freddy," "Trick or Treat Sam," and "Michael Myers masks" while his tone conveys enthusiasm and excitement as he continues describing various mask styles and related objects.  The music then fades out, with the male speaker still audible as he lists more objects in a lively tone.

The audio features a single male speaker excitedly describing various Halloween-themed items like "a bag of mini bones," spiders, squish eyeballs, and "witches fingers." He expresses amusement and appreciation for these small party favors and tattoos. Later, he mentions "woolly monsters," more spiders, pumpkins, and a bag of mini skulls, maintaining an enthusiastic tone throughout.

The clip begins with a male speaker expressing enthusiastic approval, saying "Gotta love it", followed by an expression of slight disgust or surprise, "Oh my gosh, fuzzy spiders." This transitions into upbeat background music. The speaker continues, expressing amazement while viewing items such as punch balloons, a muscle shirt, an oversized belly, and a fat suit. He notes an item described as "Bob Ross", then "Sandy and Danny from Greece." He observes the variety of kid and adult sizes, adding, "that's pretty cool, a good variety," before mentioning wigs, Cat in the Hat, Thing One and Thing Two, and Toy Story. He speaks about Disney Descendants, noting many people have inquired about them, then talks about togas, goddess dresses, and goddess tiaras. He expresses appreciation with a "Heck yes!" tone. He then observes men's sandals that wrap up the legs, followed by a mention of a voodoo doll. The clip ends with enthusiasm as the speaker says, "Oh my gosh, this is sweet."

The audio clip begins with someone describing a "skull shaped jar" that is used to hold drinks, adding that one pulls a "little thing" to dispense the beverage into a cup. The speaker then states, "That's pretty awesome", with a positive tone.

A male speaker, in an enthusiastic tone, expresses admiration for scene-setting decorations, specifically noting bloody hands on a brick wall, Jason, Michael Myers' silhouette, and glass decorations. He mentions "the twins from..." pausing to recall "The Shining" and stating, "I couldn't think of what it was called," before uttering "Red Rum." He then identifies a Beetlejuice wall decorating kit. Continuing his excitement, he praises paper lanterns with bats, saying, "That's awesome," and expresses his desire to have them at a party. Finally, he mentions a bloody plastic table cover.

The clip begins with a single male speaker describing Halloween party supplies, mentioning napkins, plates, and doorway curtains. He then identifies a "Joker" item and a Joker wig. Next, he expresses that a "Riddler accessory kit" consisting of a hat, mask, gloves, and tie is "cool". The speaker then highlights the "Riddler's cane" and reiterates that it is "pretty cool". The clip concludes with a question.

The audio clip begins with speech from a male speaker, who sounds excited and surprised as he exclaims, "looks like we got a few more things down here, wait a minute, look, a giant taco." Another male voice replies in a slightly humorous tone, stating "I could totally go for a giant taco right now." The first speaker then continues, describing a list of costume items, including antlers, a deer floral headband, and various animal ears and tails, switching to a slightly calmer tone. He then pauses to say "sorry, I get my hand in the way sometimes guys. I just get excited." There is a brief mention of a "cheetah kitty kit" before the speaker's tone turns solemn as he requests "a moment of silence to pray for Wally's kitty who's having some problems right now."

The audio clip starts with a male speaker offering a prayer, mentioning individuals and a kitten with concern and using a heartfelt tone. He transitions to discussing his plans with "Wally" to film spirit store content and expressing concern for the kitten's health. Describing the environment, he focuses on robes and capes, noting their creepiness and appeal, humorously commenting on a "red cape." He then considers a "Little Red Riding Hood" couple's outfit. The speaker then mentions clown items like wigs and a giant tie, followed by the sound of a horn. The speaker acknowledges that people don't like it when the horn is used, and then describes soft boas in yellow, orange, and purple, calling them "feathery." Finally, the clip concludes with a mention of "alien shades."

The audio clip starts with a single male speaker expressing he thinks some items are "pretty awesome". This transitions to another male speaker talking about a Venetian rabbit mask reminiscent of "Donnie Darko". He states someone asked him to look for Donnie Darko costumes and that he likes a jack-o'-lantern face mask, which he plans to get. He is disappointed that they are only available in youth sizes and he doesn't want one. The speaker then comments on a "ginormous candy machine," observing the variety of candies inside, including "chocolate coins." Finally, the speaker states that he is doing a "quick walk through" the Party City in St. Clairsville.

The clip begins with a male speaker stating, "and I'm on the road to the next one" in a casual tone. This is followed by an eerie ambient sound, seemingly aquatic in nature, transitioning quickly into a piercing scream, creating an atmosphere of intense horror.
